sense.def:
Z izrazom
seriously
pokažemo, da tisto, kar rečemo, mislimo resno. Z njim lahko tudi nekoga vprašamo, ali resnično misli tisto, kar je pravkar rekel.

seg.quote: What I do think is important, quite seriously, is that people should know the facts.
You haven't seriously locked the door?

sense.def:
To take someone or something seriously
pomeni misliti, da je nekdo pomemben in zasluži pozornost.

seg.quote: His work was not taken seriously.
